73 #define TEUCHOS_TIMER(funcName, strName) \
74  static Teuchos::Time& funcName() \
75  {static Teuchos::RCP<Time> rtn = \
76  Teuchos::TimeMonitor::getNewCounter(strName); return *rtn;}
77

84 #define TEUCHOS_FUNC_TIME_MONITOR_DIFF( FUNCNAME, DIFF ) \
85  static Teuchos::RCP<Teuchos::Time> DIFF ## blabla_localTimer; \
86  if(!DIFF ## blabla_localTimer.get()) { \
87  std::ostringstream oss; \
88  oss << FUNCNAME; \
89  DIFF ## blabla_localTimer = Teuchos::TimeMonitor::getNewCounter(oss.str()); \
90  } \
91  Teuchos::TimeMonitor DIFF ## blabla_localTimeMonitor(*DIFF ## blabla_localTimer)
92

116 #define TEUCHOS_FUNC_TIME_MONITOR( FUNCNAME ) \
117  TEUCHOS_FUNC_TIME_MONITOR_DIFF( FUNCNAME, main )
